desc_cn: 半步也。从走圭聲。讀若跬同。
止行也。一曰竈上祭名。从走畢聲。

desc_en: tight (closely sealed)/stern/strict/rigorous/severe/father

desc_cn: 輕勁有才力也。从走丩聲。讀若鐈。

desc_en: to go/to visit (e.g. another country)/to attend (a banquet etc)

surname Zhao/one of the seven states during the Warring States Period (476-220 BC)/the Former Zhao 前趙|前赵[Qian2 Zhao4] (304-329) and Later Zhao 後趙|后赵[Hou4 Zhao4] (319-350), states of the Sixteen Kingdoms

desc_cn: 趑趄，行不進也。从走次聲。
動也。从走隹聲。《春秋傳》曰：“盟于趡。”趡，地名。
善緣木走之才。从走喬聲。讀若王子蹻。

desc_en: side/edge/margin/border/boundary/CL:個|个[ge4]/simultaneously
short name for Liaoning 遼寧|辽宁[Liao2 ning2] province/Liao or Khitan dynasty (907-1125)
to attain/to reach/to amount to/to communicate/eminent
to move/to shift/to change (a position or location etc)/to promote

desc_cn: 衺行也。从辵也聲。《夏書》曰：“東迆北，會于匯。”

desc_en: to cross/to go over/to pass (time)/to celebrate (a holiday)/to live/to get along/excessively/too-
to take a step/to stride

desc_cn: 往也。从辵王聲。《春秋傳》曰：“子無我迋。”

desc_en: welcome
to move/to transport/to use/to apply/fortune/luck/fate

desc_cn: 還也。从辵从反，反亦聲。《商書》曰：“祖甲返。”

desc_en: still/still in progress/still more/yet/even more/in addition/fairly/passably (good)/as early as/even/also/else
(pronoun) this; these/(bound form) this; the (followed by a noun)/(bound form) this; these (followed by a classifier) (in this sense, commonly pr. [zhei4], esp. in Beijing)
to go forward/to advance/to go in/to enter/to put in/to submit/to take in/to admit/(math.) base of a number system/classifier for sections in a building or residential compound
far/distant/remote/(intensifier in a comparison) by far/much (lower etc)
to disobey/to violate/to separate/to go against
to link/to join/to connect/continuously/in succession/including/(used with 也[ye3], 都[dou1] etc) even/company (military)
late/delayed/slow

desc_cn: 迾也。晉趙曰迣。从辵丗聲。讀若寘。
更迭也。从辵失聲。一曰达。

desc_en: to retreat;  to withdraw/to reject
to send;  to deliver

desc_cn: 迎也。从辵屰聲。關東曰逆，關西曰迎。

desc_en: to choose/to pick/to select/to elect
to abdicate/modest/yielding/unpretentious/inferior to/(slang) to suck

desc_cn: 逍遥，猶翱翔也。从辵肖聲。
斂聚也。从辵求聲。《虞書》曰：“㫄逑孱功。”又曰：“怨匹曰逑。”

desc_en: to hand over;  to pass on
way/route/road
to stroll/to visit

desc_cn: 通也。从辵呈聲。楚謂疾行爲逞。《春秋傳》曰：“何所不逞欲。”
就也。从辵告聲。譚長說：造，上士也。

desc_en: to meet by chance/to come across/(of a calendar event) to come along/(of an event) to fall on (a particular day)/to fawn upon

desc_cn: 遠也。从辵卓聲。一曰蹇也。讀若棹苕之棹。
逶迆，衺去之皃。从辵委聲。

desc_en: to escape/leisurely/outstanding
patrol

desc_cn: 𨒋進也。从辵俞聲。《周書》曰：“無敢昬逾。”
遷也。一曰逃也。从辵盾聲。
往來𢿙也。从辵耑聲。《易》曰：“㠯事遄往。”

desc_en: everywhere/all over/classifier for actions: one time

desc_cn: 微止也。从辵曷聲。讀若桑蟲之蝎。
所行道也。从辵从𩠐。一達謂之道。
行不相遇也。从辵羍聲。《詩》曰：“挑兮達兮。”

desc_en: (bound form) to leave behind

desc_cn: 逍遥也。又，遠也。从辵䍃聲。
遇也。从辵曹聲。一曰邐行。
行難也。从辵㷠聲。《易》曰：“以往䢯。”
傳也。一曰窘也。从辵豦聲。

desc_en: to invite/to request/to intercept/to solicit/to seek

desc_cn: 邂逅，不期而遇也。从辵解聲。
